# archestra_mcp_server_team_access (Resource)

Manages team access to an MCP server.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Grant a team access to an MCP server
resource "archestra_mcp_server_team_access" "example" {
  mcp_server_id = archestra_mcp_server.my_server.id
  team_id       = archestra_team.engineering.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `mcp_server_id` (String) The ID of the MCP server.
- `team_id` (String) The ID of the team to grant access to.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier in format mcp_server_id/team_id
